Commands.Spirit Magic: Aero: 3-HIT BRV attack with low Action Delay.  Grants Medium Max BRV Up for 5 turns.
Commands.Rage Aero: Upgrades the number of hits to 5.
Commands.Dark Magic: Bio: 1-HIT BRV attack with low Action Delay.  Grants a medium probability of poisoning target for 3 turns.
Commands.Weak Damage Up: Slightly raises Weakness damage dealt for 2 turns.  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Divine Malison: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Inflicts Divine Malison debuff to the target for 2 turns.   Divine Malison is a Fire, Thunder, Wind and Holy Resistance Down debuff.

Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Aero Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Spirit Magic: Aero.
Passives.Bio Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Dark Magic: Bio.
Passives.The Devil's Laughter: When using Spirit Magic Aero, Dark Magic Bio and Divine Malison:- Provokes target for 1 turn.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Spirit Magic: Aero Charge: Increases the max uses of Spirit Magic: Aero by 1.
Passives.Dark Magic: Bio Charge: Increases the max uses of Dark Magic: Bio by 1.
Passives.Black Devil: Prevents KO if HP is over 50% and leaves its value at 1.
Passives.Rage Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while enraged.
Passives.Spirit Magic: Aero Extend: Increases Spirit Magic: Aero's max uses by 1.When using Spirit Magic: Aero and Rage Aero:- Slightly raises its potency.- Inflicts Cursed Gaze for 3 turns.- Extends the duration of Max BRV Up by 1 turn.- Triggers an HP attack after use.When using Rage Aero:- Triggers a 5-HIT Wind-elemental magic BRV+HP attack twice.- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted with Cursed Gaze.- Moderately raises the potency of Max BRV Up.Cursed Gaze lowers Defense and deals BRV damage every turn.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Dark Magic: Bio Extend: Enables Rage mode when the quest starts.When using Dark Magic: Bio and Rage Bio:- Increases the number of hits to 5.- Tremendously raises its potency.- Inflicts Cursed Gaze for 3 turns.- Triggers an HP attack after use.When using Rage Bio:- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted with Cursed Gaze.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.- Slightly raises the success rate of poisoning the target.While enraged:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.- BRV Attack+ has the following effects: + 2-HIT Wind-elemental magic BRV attack. + Moderately raises its potency. + Extends Rage mode by 3 turns (max is 5 turns).- Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+.- HP Attack+ has the following effects: + Raises BRV based on Max BRV before inflicting an HP attack. + Extends Rage mode by 3 turns (max is 5 turns).
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%.
Passives.Weak Damage Up Extend: When using Weak Damage Up, adds the following effect:- BRV stolen can overflow by a small amount.
